post.description: This endpoint lets you create a new item request in your process.

parameters.description: This is your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>, and is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Process ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

post.description: This endpoint lets you submit a specific item at workflow step in your process.

parameters.name: process_id

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: Your unique <<glossary:Instance ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.description: The <<glossary:Step Instance ID>> is the unique identifier for a particular step, and is a mandatory parameter.

200.description: This request submits an item at a specific process workflow step.

post.description: This endpoint lets you reject a specific item at workflow step in your process.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve all the items that you have initiated and participated in your process.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Account ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: process_id
parameters.description: Your Kissflow <<glossary:Process ID>>. This is a mandatory parameter.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: This is the specific page number of an item list. The page number can be specified as 1, 2, 3, etc.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items that can be listed in a page. It can be assigned any integer.

200.description: This request successfully retrieves all the items that you've initiated in your process.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve all the items that are awaiting your approval at any specific step in a process.

put.description: This endpoint helps you update the records of a specific item in your process. Only Process Admins can call this endpoint.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the details of a specific item from your Kissflow process. Only Process Admins can call this endpoint.

get.description: This endpoint lets you retrieve the list of all items from a Kissflow process. Only Process Admins can call this endpoint.

200.description: This request retrieves the list of all items in your process.

tags.name: Process
tags.description: Create and manage a <<glossary:Process>> in Kissflow using these API endpoints.

NotAuthorized.description: The client request has not been completed because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the requested resource.

Forbidden.description: The server understands the request but refuses to authorize it.
